doc.previous: Spirit currently flies to 52 destinations throughout Central America, the Caribbean, South America, and the United States. It maintains a base in Dallas/Fort Worth, Fort Lauderdale Chicago, Detroit, Atlantic City, and Las Vegas with focus cities in Myrtle Beach, Chicago-O'Hare, Dallas/Fort Worth, Detroit and Las Vegas.
